articles.content:
Joy Behar was not such a joy when she met Nicole “Snooki” Polizzi at least, that’s what the Jersey Shore: Family Vacationstarclaimed on Thursday night’s (June 3) episode of Watch What Happens Live.

articles.title: 20 Years Ago, The O.C. Gave Us Looks - The Cut
articles.description: The O.C., a teen drama set in California, gifted our tween selves with campy characters, soapy storylines, and above all, looks we couldn’t afford.
